blank to the power of 4 log subscript 40 space end subscript minus space to the power of 4 log subscript 5
equals space to the power of 4 log subscript 40 over 5 space end subscript
equals space to the power of 4 log subscript 8 space end subscript
equals to the power of 2 squared end exponent log subscript 2 cubed space end subscript
equals space 3 over 2 space. space squared log subscript 2 space end subscript
equals space 3 over 2 space. space 1
equals space 3 over 2 space
